name: bluebubbles-server
description: BlueBubbles Server is the app that powers the BlueBubbles app ecosystem

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./bluebubbles-server-ui && npm run start" "cd ./bluebubbles-server && npm run start"
scripts.build-ui: cd ./bluebubbles-server-ui && npm run build && cp -R ./build/* ../bluebubbles-server/dist/ && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run build-ui && npm run build-server && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && cp -R ./bluebubbles-server/release/* ./dist/ && rm -rf ./bluebubbles-server/release/ && rm -rf ./bluebubbles-server-ui/build/
